name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bat Nerds - Blog about Baseball, Softball

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bat Nerds - Blog about Baseball and Softball

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bat Nerds is a blog run by a group of friends. Our aim is to provide our expertise on everything you need to know when buying baseball & softball equipment. We'll provide in-depth equipment Information, useful tips & tricks and a whole lot more.

1. Useful tips & tricks
2. In-depth equipment Information
3. Information about supple kip leather  Pro Preferred series gloves
